actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Pinnacles National Monument, Calif., as wilderness, to revise the boundaries of such monument.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Pinnacles National Monument, California, as wilderness. Extends in a specified manner the boundary of the Pinnacles National Monument.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Pinnacles National Monument, Calif., as wilderness, to revise the boundaries of such monument.
